entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:40 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 38. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clear. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 56 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
